item.title: Pot holes damaged road surface in two places., 6th February
item.description:
Pot holes and a damaged road surface in two places along this section of Prestbury High St.

item.title: 20 in pothole getting deeper by the day & 1 orher side of road.Erosion, 6th February
item.description:
Outside Old Post Office 2nd gate from phone box towards Bakers Lane. Road breaking up verges eroded. I month but each rain burst and lorry making worse every day

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sevenhampton, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Potholes, very deep, very unsafe, unavoidable, 6th February
item.description:

item.title: Pothole, 6th February
item.description:
